item.title: online Status of the company Assets on Android & Apple
item.description: Explicar la solucion Necesidad conque y como lo hicimos Design and implement worldwide and integrate the solution in Latin America the Big data & Analytics solution in the thermal generation processes.

item.title: Use case PrISM Implementation
item.description: In search of a global tool for building algorithms focused on reducing unavailability. We developed a success case with the schneider team, which involved presenting a real unavailability, modeling the algorithm and understanding when we would have obtained an alarm to prevent unavailability on water pump.

item.title: Business intelligence on Monitoring Room
item.description: Explicar la solucion Necesidad conque y como lo hicimos Design and implement worldwide and integrate the solution in Latin America the Big data & Analytics solution in the thermal generation processes.

item.title: Apply Similarity-Based Modeling to monitoring assets
Analysis Optimal condenser operation
item.description: The algorithm aims to monitor the thermal load that affects the condenser. Due to a bad operation, which the action is carried out by the plant operator, whether considering the impact on unavailability or efficiency

item.title: Virtual Pump behavior
item.description: This application solves the non-existence of feedback on the position of the feed water valves of the AP, MP and BP DOMES in the control system. Based on this need, the behavior of each valve was modeled, allowing the modeled position to be compared with the position indicated by the control system setpoint. When a deviation over 5% occurs, the problem should be reviewed

item.title: Blade Path Temperature Anomalies Detection
item.description: algorithms that detect temperature deviations in the combustion chambers, comparing said deviations with a relational model of power and compressor outlet temperature, which allows detecting possible flaws in the combustion chambers. The objective of this system is to alert before the fault occurs or the alarm of the control system is activated.
